original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>使用借刀殺人計謀成功，<color=#fff999>$country1</color>已經準備對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>發動戰爭！(<color=#bceea7>借刀殺人 成功</color>)
text: Enlightenment, your subordinates have sent someone to use a borrowed knife to kill <color=#fff999>$country1</color>, and <color=#fff999>$country1</color> is ready to respond to <color=#bceea7> $city1</color> Start the war! (<color=#bceea7>Successful killing with a knife</color>)
